title: QA Test Engineer
job_overview:
Requirements
- 2–4 years of experience in software testing or a related field, with knowledge of Selenium, Python, and/or JavaScript
- Solid understanding of HTML structure, semantic markup, and web standards
- Familiarity with the HTTP protocol, status codes, and request/response cycles
- Knowledge of CSS properties, selectors, and responsive design principles
- Experience using browser developer tools for debugging and inspection
- Basic understanding of web application architecture and client-server communication
- Proficiency in testing methodologies and defect lifecycle management
- Working Hours: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM Israel Time
